visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart to display monthly average temperatures with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series is named 'Temperature' and uses the provided temperature data. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations include chart margins, background color, and legend settings to enhance readability and visual appeal.
